settings.DataSource: Goals;Defining project goals ContentModeling;Content modeling 3rdPartyIntegrations;3rd party integrations DataMigration;Data migration ContentAuthoring;Form submission admin notifications UserExperience;UX GoLive;Go-live

cms.formclass.ClassXmlSchema: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata"> <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true"> <xs:complexType> <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="Form_Form_2025_02_12_20_39"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Form_2025_02_12_20_39ID" msdata:ReadOnly="true" msdata:AutoIncrement="true" type="xs:int" /> <xs:element name="FormInserted" type="xs:dateTime" /> <xs:element name="FormUpdated" type="xs:dateTime" /> <xs:element name="Question"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="200" /> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MemberID" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:choice> </xs:complexType> <xs:unique name="Constraint1" msdata:PrimaryKey="true"> <xs:selector xpath=".//Form_Form_2025_02_12_20_39" /> <xs:field xpath="Form_2025_02_12_20_39ID" /> </xs:unique> </xs:element> </xs:schema>
